item.title: [Sharing] ASIS CTF Quals 2020
item.description:
First CTF online of summer, also our MacacaHub’s third battle this year~ Though captain warned us it’d be difficult, prepare mentally. Yep, really hard QwQ 31 total challenges, solved only 4 but still Rank 151 / 815… terrifying==

CTFtime link
